pronunciation.pinyin: sì xiàng jī běn yuán zé
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: Si4 xiang4 Ji1 ben3 Yuan2 ze2

meanings.value: the Four Cardinal Principles enunciated by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平[Deng4 Xiao3 ping2] in 1979: to uphold the socialist road, the dictatorship of the proletariat, the leadership of the CCP, and Maoism and Marxism-Leninism
